title: Poster, The Oval Office: the New Generation of Leadership, 1992
title_raw: The Oval Office: the New Generation of Leadership
signed: Imprinted in black, "Roy Lichtenstein, The Oval Office, © 1992.  Paid for by Democratic National Committee."
inscribed: Imprinted in black, bottom: "A NEW GENERATION OF LEADERSHIP".
description: Originally Lichtenstein's Pop-art screen print of oval office.  Stylized desk with yellow chair in front of yellow curtains. Free standing American flag on left behind desk.  Right side: Picture of American flag hanging wih red and white diagonal stripes and blue circles representing stars.  Partial view of yellow sofa.  Two free standing flags, one is blue with stars like that of United Nations. Left side: Picture of stylized sailboat at sea in yellow, ornate frame hanging on wall.  Partial view of yellow sofa and partial view of yellow window moulding.  Top: Ornate curved crown moulding  to illustrate the elliptical shape of room.  Bottom: Blue carpet with yellow stars arranged in circular formation.  Text below image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, The Oval Office: the New Generation of Leadership, 1992. Offset lithography on white paper. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1994-114-7
